summary: A collection of unit and integration tests that validate the functionality of adapter modules within Stable Diffusion pipelines, checking component initialization, input handling, low‑cost model behavior, custom timesteps, attention slicing, batch consistency, multi‑dimensional image processing, and xformers‑based attention.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of adapter‑enhanced diffusion pipelines, enabling reliable development, deployment, and maintenance of advanced image generation models.
